lines.text: [referring to way the police commissioner botched Red's investigation]
Well, he certainly settled that in a hurry.
How did you know it was a woman?
Oh, smell of perfume. Hong Kong Cholly pretty good defective, yes?
Pretty good defective - only it doesn't help much.
What do you mean, writing tripe like this about Red Barry?
Oh. That's what I thought you said.
I repeat, I shall never tell you where the stolen bonds are, for they belong to me and mine.
You speak rashly. Remember, my people have devised very effective ways to make the unwilling scream.

[to Natacha]
Must I threaten you to make you understand that a few more bloodstains on these bonds won't effect their value to me?
